arts.ttl: Jeremie Frimpong still ranks Celtic the BEST in one category as he gives Hoops '50/50' chance of Dortmund upset
arts.sum: Frimpong can see his old team springing a surprise on the German giants

arts.ttl: MOTM Poll: Guirassy & Adeyemi Inspire BVB to 4-2 Comeback Win Against VfL Bochum
arts.sum: Sure enough, Dortmund’s third came just over ten minutes later, when Guirassy scored his second of the night, and shortly after, substitute Felix Nmecha made sure of all three points with a speculative shot that got a little help from Bochum’s goalkeeper, Patrick Drewes. They got the equalizer just after the hour when Emre Can converted a penalty won by Guirassy, and by this point, it seemed like only a matter of time until they would take the lead.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Borussia Dortmund 4-2 Bochum: Serhou Guirassy brace secures comeback win
arts.sum: A brace from Serhou Guirassy secured a comeback win for Borussia Dortmund after Bochum raced into a 2-0 lead at the Westfalenstadion in the Ruhr derby. 4-2 winners on the…

arts.ttl: Bundesliga: Dortmund 4-2 Bochum - Guirassy double inspires comeback win
arts.sum: Matúš Bero celebrates after scoring the opening goal for Bochum, stunning the home crowd at Signal Iduna Park - IMAGO/kolbert-press/Marc Niemeyer Borussia Dortmund overcame a two-goal deficit to secure a thrilling 4-2 win against Bochum, with Serhou Guirassy netting twice in a remarkable turnaround at Signal Iduna Park.

arts.ttl: Serhou Guirassy scores twice in Dortmund's 4-2 comeback win over local rival Bochum
arts.sum: Serhou Guirassy scored twice and won a penalty as Borussia Dortmund overturned a two-goal deficit to beat local rival Bochum 4-2 in the Bundesliga on Friday ahead of facing Celtic in the Champions League next week. Dortmund had been demolished 5-1 by Stuttgart last week and the pressure on new coach Nuri Sahin seemed to be mounting when his team conceded two early goals against Bochum.

arts.ttl: Bundesliga Match Thread: Dortmund Host Bochum
arts.sum: Use those and don’t share any illegal streams in the comments. Absolutely no illegal streams.

arts.ttl: Gio Reyna injury update: will he be called up by Pochettino?
arts.sum: After U.S. midfielder Gio Reyna suffered a groin injury while training with the national team during the last international break, in which he was unable to participate and missed the matches against Canada and New Zealand, there is now what appears to be a light at the end of the tunnel . The Dortmund coach assured that the latest update regarding Reyna is encouraging and he could in fact return in just a couple of weeks: “ Gio Reyna is on the right track ”, Sahin said, “ he might be able to play before the international break,” said the coach.

arts.ttl: Cameron Carter Vickers a major Celtic injury doubt for Borussia Dortmund as Brendan Rodgers swerves firm return date
arts.sum: The centre-back is out of the clash with St Johnstone and could miss the blockbuster clash in Germany

arts.ttl: Predicted Borussia Dortmund XI vs Bochum: Nuri Şahin to make several changes
arts.sum: Nuri Şahin is expected to make several changes as Borussia Dortmund host Ruhr rivals Bochum in the Bundesliga tonight. This comes following last weekend’s humiliating 5-1 defeat against VfB Stuttgart…

arts.ttl: Bochum vs. Borussia Dortmund: What is the 'little Revierderby'?
arts.sum: Dortmund took the spoils in the Bundesliga and DFB Cup between times, rather more in keeping with the head-to-head record between the two Ruhr district rivals. With Schalke still in the Bundesliga 2, the top flight remains without its Revierderby.
